metadata.title: Aviation Airplane Aviator Long Sleeve T-Shirt
features: Quick Shipping! Ships On The Next Business Day
All Our Graphic Tees Are Designed & Proffesionally Printed by Kings Of NY
PRODUCT: Aviation Airplane Pilot Army Navy Mechanic Aviator Long Sleeve T-Shirt
Long Sleeve T-Shirt made with 100% Cotton. Grey is 90% Cotton and 10% Poly.
BRAND: Kings Of NY | AVAILABLE COLORS: Black, White, Heather Grey
description: This is our Kings Of NY original Aviation Airplane Pilot Army Navy Mechanic Aviator Mens T-Shirt. All our t-shirts for men are printed on 100% cotton and grey is 90% cotton and 10% poly. This tee features a original graphic design from our in house artists which you can not find anywhere. Our shirts range from streetwear style, funny, progressive, politic and dope sayings and quotes.
